data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bolaños, Federico, Wake, David B. (2009): Two new species of montane web-footed salamanders (Plethodontidae: Bolitoglossa) from the Costa Rica-Panamá border region. Zootaxa 1981: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185285
